EmailTemplate.name: TRI- Closure
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}: {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c}
Please be advised that your request relating to case number: #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been successfully resolved.
Thank you
{!User.Name} {!User.Surname} Trade Client Services
